Network requirements: POSIX send() and recv(). API to supply your own replacement.
Thread safety: Thread-safe, needs custom mutex hooks if neither POSIX nor Windows threads are available.
Supported operating systems: Generally any POSIX platforms or Windows, commonly tested platforms include GNU/Linux, Win32/64, OS X, Solaris, OpenWRT, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD.

Network requirements: POSIX read() and write(). API to supply your own replacement.
Thread safety: Threading layer available (POSIX or own hooks)
Random seed: Random seed set through entropy pool
